content:
MatchEvaluator Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that is called each time a regular expression match is found during a stem.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace* method operation.

In this Article

public delegate string MatchEvaluator(Match match);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
MatchEvaluator

Remarks

You can use a MatchEvaluator delegate method to perform a custom verification or manipulation operation for each match found by a replacement method such as System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Replace(String,MatchEvaluator). For each matched string, the Replace method calls the MatchEvaluator delegate method with a Match object that represents the match. The delegate method performs whatever processing you prefer and returns a string that the Replace method substitutes for the matched string.
